attributes.class: =if(@currentField == 'Done', 'sp-field-severity--good', if(@currentField == 'In Progress', 'sp-field-severity--low', if(@currentField == 'Not Started', 'sp-field-severity--warning', if(@currentField == 'Has issues', 'sp-field-severity--severeWarning', 'sp-field-severity--blocked')))) + ' ms-fontColor-neutralSecondary'

attributes.iconName: =if(@currentField == 'Done', 'SkypeCircleCheck', if(@currentField == 'In Progress', 'Forward', if(@currentField == 'Not Started', 'Error', if(@currentField == 'Has issues', 'Warning', 'ErrorBadge'))))
